nodes.text: The T-13 Airspeeder was an airspeeder manufactured by Incom Corporation. It could carry two people, a pilot and a passenger, seated in tandem.

The T-13 Airspeeder was identified in The Star Wars Sourcebook by way of an image caption under the drawing of an airspeeder. In the Second Edition of the sourcebook the image was retained but the caption was removed.
